# Python bytecode
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual Environment
venv/
env/
.env/

# IDE Files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Logs and Databases
*.log
*.sqlite
*.db

# Backup Files
*.bak
*~

# Build and Distribution
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
*.spec

# OS Generated Files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Temporary Files
*.tmp
*.swp
temp/
tmp/

# Sensitive Information
config.ini
secrets.json
*.env

# Large Binary Files
*.exe
*.msi
*.zip

# Installer and Output Directories
Output/
Installer/
